name: template-app
description: A react boilerplate using eslint, browserify and postcss

scripts.build: browserify -d -e src/index.js -t babelify -o dist/index.js && npm run styles
scripts.build:production: NODE_ENV=production browserify -e src/index.js -t babelify -o dist/index.js && npm run uglify
scripts.watch: npm run build && light-server -s . -p 8080 -w 'src/**/*.js*  # npm run build' -w 'src/styles/**/*.css # npm run styles'

author: Philipp Wambach
